metadata.title: Mohammed Aydan | Web & Mobile App Developer
metadata.description: Web and Mobile App Developer skilled in Flutter, React, Next.js, and .NET Core. Building high-performance, scalable web and mobile applications using modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.description: I'm Mohammed Aydan, a Computer Science student at Mansoura University, Egypt (Expected graduation: 2027). I specialize in web development and mobile app development using Flutter with a strong focus on high performance, scalability, and exceptional user experience. My hands-on development experience includes creating modern web applications and interactive mobile apps, which drives me to continuously learn and enhance my skills in the latest technologies to create functional applications that provide outstanding user experiences.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Academic Background
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer and Information Science
education.university: Faculty of Computer & Information Sciences – Mansoura University, Egypt

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Successfully completed projects across diverse web and mobile platforms

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Advanced programming languages in my comprehensive technical arsenal

frameworks.title: Frameworks
frameworks.description: Sophisticated frameworks and libraries I've masterfully acquired

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Valuable years of development experience and continuous learning

myPortfolio.title: My Portfolio
myPortfolio.description: Created a personal portfolio website using Next.js to showcase projects and skills in a modern and innovative style.

ecommerceApp.title: E-commerce App
ecommerceApp.description: Developed a fully-featured e-commerce application using Next.js, delivering a seamless, fast, and responsive shopping experience across all devices.

ecommerceApi.title: E-commerce API
ecommerceApi.description: Built a robust e-commerce API using .NET Core to efficiently manage categories, products, and users with advanced security and high performance.

socialWebApp.title: Social Media App
socialWebApp.description: Developed a comprehensive social media app using React.js with advanced interactive features and exceptional performance.

socialApi.title: Social Media REST API
socialApi.description: Designed a comprehensive RESTful API for a social media platform, enabling post creation, comments, likes, user following, notifications, and user management with high efficiency.

chatApp.title: Chat App
chatApp.description: Added advanced chat features to the social media app using Flutter with Bloc and Firebase for real-time messaging and direct communication.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Created a professional and responsive personal portfolio website using Next.js and Firebase to showcase projects and skills in a modern and innovative style.

storeApp.title: Store App
storeApp.description: Built a comprehensive e-commerce mobile application using Flutter and Dart with smooth user interface and excellent shopping experience.

blogWebApp.title: Blog Web App
blogWebApp.description: Developed a responsive and user-friendly blog web application using React.js, offering seamless content browsing and interaction.

blogMobileApp.title: Blog Mobile App
blogMobileApp.description: Built a cross-platform blog mobile application with Flutter, delivering smooth performance and intuitive navigation on both iOS and Android.

blogApi.title: Blog API
blogApi.description: Implemented a robust backend API with Laravel and MySQL to manage posts, comments, users, and secure data operations.

socialApp.title: Social Media App
socialApp.description: Developed a comprehensive social media application using Flutter and Supabase with advanced interactive features and exceptional performance.
